Lapis lazuli

phono-semantic-matching

𓇋 𓁹 𓏏 𓅂 𓈒 𓏥 वैडूर्य vaiḍūrya 𓃀 𓂧 𓈒 𓏥 •bιdura 𓃀 𓇋 𓏏 𓊌 petra

𒎎𒍝𒆳𒀀 la-za-kurᵇduru₅ ლაჟვარდი lažvardi…dura वैडूर्य vaiḍūrya

𒎎𒍝𒆳𒀀 zaᵇkur-duru₅ 𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓 kurzabduru

𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓 •Kurspat 𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓 •kuzbaⁿδo > kusvaño > κύFανος 𐀓𐀷𐀜 ku-wa-no 𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓 •kuzbaⁿχειρό > kusvanqe > 𐀓𐀷𐀜𐀤 ku-wa-no-qe

𒎎 𒍝𒆳𒀀 na4 za-gin₃ᵖduru5 (sic!) zaginduru "lapis"

𒍝𒆳 zagin ≈ 𓐍 𓋴 𓃀 𓂧 𓈒 𓏥 reverse

𒍝𒆳 zagin 𒎎𒍝𒆳 na4 za-gin3 "shining; lapis lazuli" #uqnû <> nur

𒊌 lupus 𒈜 <> lapis 𒊌 𒉡 uq-nu | lapis lazuli | 𐎛𐎖𐎐𐎜 ỉqnủ … 𓁹 Augen 𓂂 ? 𓇋 𓁹 𓏏 𓅂 𓈒 𓏥 blue! ☑☑☑
𒊌 𒉡 uq-nu | lapis lazuli | < •aquarny > asurⁿ ⇔ azureⁿ blue (see 𒊌 for R component)
𒊌 𒉡 uq-nu | lapis lazuli | 𐎛𐎖𐎐𐎜 ỉqnủ 𒂟 𒍝 𒆳 NA4.ZA.GÌN

𐀓𐀷𐀜 ku-wa-no κύFανος > κύανος gemstone ( lapis lazuli ) 𐀓𐀷𐀜 ku-wa-no < kusbano 𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𐀓𐀷𐀜 ku-wa-no ukuano 𐎛 𐎖 𐎐𐎜 ỉqunu ỉqnủ

phono-semantic-matching

La piece l'azure
Piece of Blue

𓃀 𓇋 𓏏 𓊌 𓇋 𓁹 𓏏 𓅂 𓈒 𓏥

La piece q'azure
𓃀 𓂧 𓐍 𓊃 𓈓 permuted
𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓 “Lapis lazuli”

Le petra ala zuri
Stone of Heaven

𓊪 𓏏 𓇯 𓊌 𒀭

Lapis is the Latin word for "stone" and lazulī is the genitive form of the Medieval Latin lazulum, which is taken from the Arabic لازورد lāzaward, itself from the Persian لاجورد lājevard. It means "sky" or "heaven";

لاجورد lājevard lāj:verde *ǵʰelh₃- “green” ⇔ glass
لاجورد lājevard *varta- “stone” ⇔ petra

cognate with Wakhi wurt (“stone”), Northern Kurdish ber (“stone”), Central Kurdish بەرد berd, “stone”, Northern Luri بٱرد bard, “stone” Khotanese ūḍāra-, “crystal”

𒂟 𒍝 𒆳 lapis lazuli ⇔ 𒂟 ZÁLAG.ZA
𒂟 𒍝 𒆳 NA4.ZA.GÌN La.zu.… lazuli (sic?)
𒂟 ⇔ 𓈖 𐦊 naila / Rhein ERIN
𒂟 nûru 𒉢 NU ⋍ 𒉡𒊑 نُور nūr : light 1/noir ⇔ nabu 𒀭𒀝
𒀭𒂟 ZÁLAG day-light

𓐍 𓋴 𓃀 𓆓 𓂂 | blue, blue-black | Kar-Schwartz ⇔
𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓 | lapis lazuli | 𒍝𒆳𒀀 𓐍 Kar-Spart 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓
𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓 | lapis lazuli | 𓐍 (ka)lāzaward لَازَوَرْد
𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓 | lapis lazuli | Kaspian™ ⇔ 𓐍 𓋴 𓋞
𓐍 𓊃 𓃀 𓂧 𓈓 | lapis lazuli | ≠ Asbest ἄσβεστος “unquenchable”

𓐍 𓋴 𓃀 𓆓 𓂂 | blue, blue-black (of hair) | Kar-Schwartz Kars-Blau 𓆓
𓐍 𓋴 𓃀 𓆓 𓈒 𓏥 | lapis lazuli | caspic ore / op'lzlý lazuli@CES,latin Lapis=stone ⇔ pencil / Persian لاجورد lājavard ⋍ łaidzourad place where lapis lazuli was mined! / ⇔

𒄷𒆷𒇻 ḫu-la-lu
𒄷𒆷𒇻 a valuable stone

𒎎𒍝𒆳𒄑𒀸 na4 za-gin₃ĝeš-dili zaginĝešdili "string of lapis lazuli beads" 𒆳𒀀 kur-duru₅ <> Kordel cord
